sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
mv.VehicleID $VehicleIDOrder$
pw.name $workUnitNameOrder$
mv.registrationNo $registrationNoOrder$
mv.onLineRate $onLineRateOrder$
mv.offLineRate $offLineRateOrder$
) RowNo, mv.registrationNo, pw.name as workUnitName,mv.vehiclecount,mv.VehicleID, mv.onLineRate, (100-onLineRate) as offLineRate from( select vehiclecount, VehicleID,workUnitID,registrationNo, convert(decimal(10,2),100*(cast(vehiclecount as decimal(18,2)))/cast((#timeDay#*24*60)/10 as decimal(18,2))) as onLineRate from( select isnull(ta.vehiclecount ,0) as vehiclecount,mv.id as VehicleID,mv.workUnitID,mv.registrationNo from Pub_Vehicle mv WITH(nolock)
LEFT OUTER JOIN Ent_userVehicle ev WITH(nolock) ON mv.id=ev.vehicleID
LEFT OUTER JOIN (select count(VehicleID) as vehiclecount, VehicleID from TAnalyseRecord
RecTime>=cast(#startDate# AS dateTime)
cast(#endDate# AS dateTime)>=RecTime
GROUP BY VehicleID )ta on ta.VehicleID=mv.id
mv.isDeleted <> 1
AND ev.UserId=#userId#
)mv GROUP BY vehiclecount,VehicleID,workUnitID,registrationNo)mv left outer join pub_workUnit AS pw ON mv.workUnitID=pw.id where 1=1
and pw.name='$workUnitNameWhere$'
and mv.registrationNo LIKE '%$registrationNo$%'
and pw.fullid like '%$fullId$%'
)A
A.RowNo BETWEEN $fromRow$ AND $toRow$

SELECT count(*) FROM( select vehiclecount, VehicleID,workUnitID,registrationNo, convert(decimal(10,2),100*(cast(vehiclecount as decimal(18,2)))/cast((#timeDay#*24*60)/10 as decimal(18,2))) as onLineRate from( select isnull(ta.vehiclecount ,0) as vehiclecount,mv.id as VehicleID,mv.workUnitID,mv.registrationNo from Pub_Vehicle mv WITH(nolock)
LEFT OUTER JOIN Ent_userVehicle ev WITH(nolock) ON mv.id=ev.vehicleID
LEFT OUTER JOIN (select count(VehicleID) as vehiclecount, VehicleID from TAnalyseRecord
RecTime>=cast(#startDate# AS dateTime)
cast(#endDate# AS dateTime)>=RecTime
GROUP BY VehicleID )ta on ta.VehicleID=mv.id
mv.isDeleted <> 1
AND ev.UserId=#userId#
)mv GROUP BY vehiclecount,VehicleID,workUnitID,registrationNo)mv left outer join pub_workUnit AS pw ON mv.workUnitID=pw.id where 1=1
and pw.name='$workUnitNameWhere$'
and mv.registrationNo LIKE '%$registrationNo$%'
and pw.fullid like '%$fullId$%'
